title: Congress Races to Finish Legislation To-Do List by Year-End
sub_head: Democrats work on an annual defense bill and a debt-ceiling resolution, and try to complete a $2 trillion social-spending and climate measure
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”Congress is racing against the clock to complete a series of must-pass pieces of legislation, with Democrats also pushing to finish their roughly $2 trillion social and climate policy legislation by the end of the year.
The scramble is coming as President Biden confronts low polling numbers and high inflation, and as Democrats are increasingly worried about their ability to retain the majority in the House in the midterms next year. Lawmakers are under pressure to pass the bills ahead of contentious campaigning that will start in earnest in coming months.
